articles.title: Earliest known honey jars in Africa are 3,500 years old - EarthSky
articles.description: An ancient people with a sweet tooth - the Nok culture of sub-Saharan Africa - used terracotta pots to hold honey 3,500 years ago. They may be the earliest confirmed honey collectors in Africa.
